name: Saudade
description:
Saudade is a first person, exploration, narrative-based game.

Play as your four-legged friend, Lucky, and find out where his owners whereabouts have been.

This game was the result of an assessment which required a game on the oculus rift, heavily narrative reliant and emotion enducing. Good for casual players who just want a quick game to finish.

Production Period: 4 weeks

MEET THE TEAM!

Regine Caramancion - Game Designer, programmer and narrator

Jokes it was only me #cry

Controls:

WASD movement

SPACE BAR jump

F to interact

Developer Notes:

-The first file provided is the standard version of the game

-The second file is the Oculus Rift version of the game

-After you find a clue, click on the dogs mat to go to the next day (didn't have time to get playtesters)
